nodes.text: The Xyrass were a small, skeleton-like humanoid species from Tabor V.
The Xyrass were skeleton-like pygmies, with a hard, thick skin and very sharp teeth, similar to needles.
They lived in primitive tribes, and established themselves in small hut in tree trunks. They used poisoned arrows to mutilate, kill or drive mad their prey.
The Xyrass was created by Jean Balczesak for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario L'écume de l'espace which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 44.
